Sets the maximum stack size for unstackable items (1 is default/disabled)
carpet.rule.stackableUnstackables.desc: Comma-separated list of Minecraft item identifiers (e.g.: minecraft:totem_of_undying,minecraft:water_bucket) or just the item name (e.g.: totem_of_undying,water_bucket). obfuscation mappings are dumb - veygax
carpet.rule.playerLeash.desc: Allows players to leash other players with leads
